title: Best Google Pixel 9a screen protectors
description: Keep your Pixel 9a display protected with these screen protectors. The post Best Google Pixel 9a screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your Pixel 9a display protected with these screen protectors.
text: Pixel 9a Lifestyle Photography with Composed UI 24H077x011 The Google Pixel 9a is here as the newest affordable Pixel smartphone. It sports a 6.3-inch P-OLED display. This is slightly larger than the predecessor’s 6.1-inch panel. It offers 1080 x 2424 pixels resolution, HDR compatiblity, 120Hz refresh rate, and 1,800 nits brightness. The display also supports Always On Display and has Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection. This does offer some level of durability to the display but you still need a good screen protector. Otherwise, you could end up with a phone display which is scratched, smudged, or worse shattered. This is why we are here to help. Check out these best Google Pixel 9a screen protectors. Best Google Pixel 9a cases Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector (2-pack) This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. Supershieldz Screen Protector (3-pack) This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties. Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack) This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. Natbok Screen Protector (2-pack) This 9H rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away. amFilm Screen Protector (2-pack) It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card. html:
Pixel 9a Lifestyle Photography with Composed UI 24H077x011

The Google Pixel 9a is here as the newest affordable Pixel smartphone. It sports a 6.3-inch P-OLED display. This is slightly larger than the predecessor’s 6.1-inch panel. It offers 1080 x 2424 pixels resolution, HDR compatiblity, 120Hz refresh rate, and 1,800 nits brightness.

The display also supports Always On Display and has Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection. This does offer some level of durability to the display but you still need a good screen protector. Otherwise, you could end up with a phone display which is scratched, smudged, or worse shattered. This is why we are here to help. Check out these best Google Pixel 9a screen protectors.

  • Best Google Pixel 9a cases

Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away.

Supershieldz Screen Protector (3-pack)

This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties.

Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack)

This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating.

Natbok Screen Protector (2-pack)

This 9H rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away.

amFilm Screen Protector (2-pack)

It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card.

Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice.
